text: Most Eligible Bachelor is an upcoming Indian Telugu-language film written and directed by Bhaskar and produced by Bunny Vas and Vasu Varma on GA2 Pictures featuring Akhil Akkineni and Pooja Hegde. The music was composed by Gopi Sundar. The film is scheduled to release on the occasion of Pongal in January 2021. == Cast == *Akhil Akkineni as Aditya Vasudevan *Pooja Hegde as Vibha *Aamani *Murali Sharma *Vennela Kishore *Jayaprakash *Pragathi *Amit Tiwari *Eesha Rebba * Getup Srinu *Sudigali Sudheer *Abhay Bethiganti == Production == In February 2019, story discussions took place between Akhil Akkineni and director Bhaskar with GA2 Pictures's Bunny Vas attached to produce the movie. On 24 May 2019, the film was officially launched at Filmnagar temple with Pooja. Akhil's parents Akkineni Nagarjuna, Amala Akkineni along with film crew joined the occasion. It was also revealed director Vasu Varma is co-producing along with Bunny Vas. The film's casting crew auditioned over 100 actresses and models for leading actress role. They finalised Pooja Hegde as the lead in August 2019. Filming started early September 2019. The music was composed by Gopi Sundar, including the song "Manasa Manasa". == Release == Most Eligible Bachelor was initially scheduled to release in April 2020. Due to the COVID-19 pandemic,https://www.tollywood.net/story-line-of-akhils-meb-revealed/ the release was pushed back to January 2021, to coincide with Pongal. == References == == External links == * Category:Indian films Category:Telugu- language films Category:Indian thriller films Category:Upcoming films Category:Films shot in India Category:Films shot in Telangana Category:Upcoming Telugu-language films Category:Films postponed due to the COVID-19 pandemic
title: Most Eligible Bachelor (film)
